summary: An unnamed French intelligence service spies on and analyzes a French diplomat code name '51' to identify a method to control him.
cast: François Marthouret|Claude Marcault|Philippe Rouleau|Nathalie Juvet|Roger Planchon|Françoise Lugagne|Françoise Béliard|Patrick Chesnais|Jenny Clève|Jean Dautremay|Daniel Mesguich|Gérard Dessalles|Jean-Michel Dupuis|Isabelle Ganz|Sabine Glaser|Christophe Malavoy|Jean Martin|Marie Matile|Stephan Meldegg|Claire Nadeau|Anna Prucnal|Bernard Salvage|Didier Sauvegrain|Pierre Semmler|László Szabó|Uta Taeger|Jacques Zabor|Hélène Arié|Michel Aumont|Liliane Coutanceau|Jean Mermet|Sacha Pitoëff|Roseanna Sacco|Jean-Pierre Barlier|René Bouloc|Yan Brian|Hubert Buthion|Corinne Clève|Michel Fortin|Liliane Gaudet|Gilles Guillot|Pierre Londiche|Clovis Maunoury|Pierre Maxence|Pierre Meyrand|Olivier Nolin|Jean-Luc Terrade|Henri Viscogliosi|Clovis|Pierre Michaud|Julie-Amour Rossini
title: El dossier 51
